  list(
    a = rnorm(20, 0, 5),

list_norms[["b"]]

Let's reuse the function that we wrote last time.
```{r}
mean_and_sd = function(x){
  
  mean_x = mean(x)
  sd_x = sd(x)
  
  out_df = 
    tibble(
      mean = mean_x,
      sd = sd_x
    )
  
  return(out_df)
}
```

use the function
```{r}
mean_and_sd(list_norms[["a"]])
```
